channel.title: Golang on zentechnista
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on zentechnista

item.title: Ten Minutes Of Go
item.description: It’s probably no secret by now that I am a big fan of Go (also known as Golang), an open source programming language that is known for its speed and efficiency. As we move towards Go 2 and the eventual nuances and challenges that will come with its newest iteration, I want to take a few minutes to talk about what I think makes Go so special.

item.title: Sprints, Marathons, and Code
item.description: Roughly about 3 months ago to the day, I made an exciting decision to leave my previous job to join an e-commerce and social analytics startup. It wasn’t a particularly difficult decision - I’m pretty sure wanting to hide under a rock ever Monday morning is not a great sign that you’re enjoying your current position - but still, it represented a level of change that was both fun and intimidating.
